summary.span: 返回系统上当前安装的语音合成（文字到语音）语音的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that are currently installed on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法将验证每个声音 (的文本到语音转换引擎是否在注册表中找到) 满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices (engines for text-to-speech) it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序无法选择其 属性为的声音 `False` 。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PhonemeReached As EventHandler(Of PhonemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当音素达到时引发。

span.span: Raised when a phoneme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 音素是书写语言的基本组成部分，通常是字母 (或表示一个或多个不同声音的两个字母) 的组合。A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds. 例如，字母 "c" 是在 "cinder" 中听起来像 "s" 的音素，或类似于 "catch" 中的 "k"。For example, the letter "c" is a phoneme that may sound like "s" in "cinder", or like "k" in "catch". 书面字词是音素的行为。A written word is an assemblage of phonemes. 更改 word 中的音素将更改其拼写。Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling. 实例 为构成音素的单词的每个部分生成一个事件。A instance generates a event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme. 例如，对于 "主题" 一词，会生成三个 事件：一个用于 "th" 声音，一个用于 "e" 声，另一个用于 "m" 声 (我的) 。For example, for the word "theme" would generate three events; one for the "th" sound, one for the "e" sound, and one for the "m" sound (me). 有关与事件关联的数据的示例和信息，请参阅 。For an example and information about data associated with the event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectVoice(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 要选择该的语音的名称。

span.span: The name of the voice to select.

summary.span: 通过名称选择特定语音。

span.span: Selects a specific voice by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法和 类获取可选择的已安装的文本到语音 (TTS) 语音的名称。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要选择一种语音，请将该属性的全部内容 作为该方法的参数进行传递 。To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the property as the argument for the method. 对象选择 `name` 语音的属性中包含的第一个已安装语音 。The object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's property. 执行区分大小写的子字符串比较以确定声音是否与匹配 `name` 。The performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`. 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序无法选择其 属性为的声音 `False` 。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property. 若要选择按性别、年龄或区域设置的语音，请使用其中一种 方法。To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the methods.

summary.span: 选择具有特定性格的语音。

span.span: Selects a voice with specific characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法和 类获取可选择的已安装的文本到语音 (TTS) 语音的名称。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 对象选择与指定特性匹配的第一个已安装语音。The object selects the first installed voice that matches the specified characteristics. 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序无法选择其 属性为的声音 `False` 。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property. 若要按名称选择语音，请使用 方法To select a voice by name, use the method

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法和 类获取可选择的已安装的文本到语音 (TTS) 语音的名称。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 对象将查找其 和 属性与 `gender` 和参数匹配 `age` 的已安装语音。The object finds installed voices whose and properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters. 计算所找到的匹配项的数目，并在计数等于参数时返回声音 `voiceAlternate` 。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序无法选择其 属性为的声音 `False` 。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property. 若要根据其他特征选择语音，请参阅其他 重载。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要按名称选择语音，请使用 方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象查找其 、 和 属性与 `gender` 、 `age` 和 `culture` 参数匹配的声音。The object finds voices whose , , and properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters. 计算所找到的匹配项的数目，并在计数等于参数时返回声音 `voiceAlternate` 。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. Microsoft Windows 和 Speech API 接受所有有效的语言-国家/地区代码。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes. 若要使用参数中指定的语言执行文本到语音转换 `culture` ，必须安装支持该语言-国家/地区代码的语音合成引擎。To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed. Microsoft Windows 7 随附的语音合成引擎使用以下语言-国家/地区代码：The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-us。en-US. 英语（美国）English (United States) - zh-chs-CN。zh-CN. 中文（中国）Chinese (China) - zh-chs-幼圆。zh-TW. 中文（台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 还允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如 "en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 当应用程序调用时 ，该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音， 将其 属性设置为 `False` 。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序无法选择其 属性为的声音 `False` 。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常，应用程序不会设置语音的 属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property. 若要根据其他特征选择语音，请参阅其他 重载。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要按名称选择语音，请使用 方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

summary.span: 从字符串、 对象或 对象同步生成语音输出。

span.span: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以同步方式生成语音。The methods generate speech synchronously. 方法不会返回，直到实例的内容 完全被播讲。The methods do not return until the content of the instance has been completely spoken. 这是生成语音的最简单方法。This is the simplest way to generate speech. 但是，如果应用程序需要在说话时执行任务（例如突出显示文本、绘制动画、监视器控件或其他任务），请使用 方法或 方法以异步方式生成语音。However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the methods or the method to generate speech asynchronously. 在调用此方法的过程中， 可能会引发以下事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - .. 合成器的讲述状态更改时引发。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - .. 合成器开始生成语音时引发。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - .. 每次合成器达到一种语言的字母或字母组合时引发。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - .. 每次合成器完成字词时引发。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - .. 每次出现口述输出时，需要更改嘴或用于生成语音的面部肌肉的位置。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - .. 当合成器在提示符处遇到书签时引发。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - .. 合成器的说话声音发生变化时引发。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. 在 处理任何方法时不会引发事件 。The does not raise the event while processing any of the methods.

summary.span: 从字符串、 对象或 对象异步生成语音输出。

span.span: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以异步方式生成语音。The methods generate speech asynchronously. 方法会立即返回，而不会等待对象的内容 完成说话。The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the object to finish speaking. 如果你的应用程序需要在说话时执行任务，例如突出显示文本、绘制动画、监视器控件或其他任务，请使用。Use if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks. 在调用此方法的过程中， 可能会引发以下事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - .. 合成器的讲述状态更改时引发。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - .. 合成器开始生成语音时引发。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - .. 每次合成器达到一种语言的字母或字母组合时引发。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - .. 每次合成器完成字词时引发。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - .. 每次出现口述输出时，需要更改嘴或用于生成语音的面部肌肉的位置。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - .. 当合成器在提示符处遇到书签时引发。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - .. 合成器的说话声音发生变化时引发。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. - .. 合成器完成操作时引发 。Raised when the synthesizer finishes a operation. 如果你的应用程序不需要在说话时执行任务，则可以使用 方法或 方法同步生成语音。If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the methods or the method to generate speech synchronously.

summary.span: 取消一个排队的提示的异步合成操作。

span.span: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用此方法为以下项取消异步操作：You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - 由方法指定的的内容 。The contents of a specified by a method. - 由方法指定的的内容 。The contents of a specified by a method. - 包含由方法指定的 SSML 的的内容 。The contents of a containing SSML specified by a method. 当你调用 、 或时 ，系统将创建一个 对象并使用该方法的参数的内容填充该对象，并返回该 对象。When you call , , or , System.Speech creates a object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the object. 如果保留返回的的副本 ，则可以将其传递到， 以取消或对象中指定的内容 。If you retain a copy of the returned , you can pass it into to cancel speaking content specified in a or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SpeakAsyncCancelAll() cil managed

summary.span: 取消所有排队、异步、语音合成操作。

span.span: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakCompleted As EventHandler(Of SpeakCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 完成提示的讲话的时候引发。

span.span: Raised when the completes the speaking of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 任何或方法完成时引发事件 。The raises the event at the completion of any of the or methods. 类没有属性，并且不会从事件返回数据 。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 提供它是为了使应用程序作者能够编写事件的事件处理程序 。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakProgress As EventHandler(Of SpeakProgressEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 使用提示的每个单词后引发。

span.span: Raised after the speaks each individual word of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 、 或方法中的任何一个在提示符下讲述的新字词，都将引发此事件 。The raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 有关与事件关联的数据的示例和详细信息，请参阅 。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 、 、 或方法之一开始处理提示符时，将引发此事件 。The raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 类没有属性，并且不会从事件返回数据 。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 提供它是为了使应用程序作者能够编写事件的事件处理程序 。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

span.span: Raised when the state of the changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当其讲话发生更改时，将引发此事件 。The raises this event when its speaking changes. 有关与事件关联的数据的示例和详细信息，请参阅 。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see . 若要暂停和继续语音合成，请使用 和 方法。To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event VisemeReached As EventHandler(Of VisemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 viseme 达到时引发。

span.span: Raised when a viseme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Viseme 是 pronouncing 音素时，嘴的基本位置。A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme. Visemes 是音素的直观表示形式。Visemes are visual representations of phonemes. 对于美国英语，visemes 支持21个，其中每个都对应于一个或多个音素。System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes. 当到达新的音素时，将引发事件，而与以前的音素不同，则会引发 viseme。 events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached. 由于某些 visemes 表示多个音素，因此， 如果到达的下一个音素与上一个音素相同的 viseme，则不会生成事件。Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme. 例如，对于说词 "this zone"，将为 " this" 中的 "s" 和 "zone" 中的 "z" 引发事件。For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone". 但是， 不会为 "区域" 中的 "z" 引发事件，因为它对应于 "this" 中与 "s" 相同的 viseme。However, a event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this". 下面是21个 SAPI 音素和音素组的列表，它们对应于美国英语的 viseme。The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English. |VisemeViseme|音素 (s) Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |00|黑屏silence| |11|ae，ax，ahae, ax, ah| |22|aaaa| |33|aoao| |44|3om-ey-2vk，eh，糟糕ey, eh, uh| |55|ler| |66|y、url-iy-ung、ih、ixy, iy, ih, ix| |77|w，uww, uw| |88|owow| |99|awaw| |1010|oyoy| |1111|ayay| |1212|hh| |1313|rr| |1414|ll| |1515|s、zs, z| |1616|sh、ch、yey-jh-tfz、zh-chssh, ch, jh, zh| |1717|th，dhth, dh| |1818|f、vf, v| |1919|d、t、nd, t, n| |2020|k、g、ngk, g, ng| |2121|p，b，mp, b, m| 有关与事件关联的数据的信息 `VisemeReached` ，请参阅 。For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see .
